Text: Conjoined Fetus Lady:  The 18th episode of the series overall, it originally aired on Comedy Central in the United States on June 3, 1998.

Triplets:<Conjoined Fetus Lady
2:
--------------------
<Text: Conjoined Fetus Lady:  The episode was written by series co-creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone, along with David R. Goodman, and directed by Parker.>
Triplets:<Conjoined Fetus Lady
3:
--------------------
Text: Conjoined Fetus Lady:  In the episode, South Park Elementary's dodgeball team travels to China to compete for the dodgeball championship, while the town of South Park pays tribute to the school nurse, who is living with conjoined twin myslexia.
Triplets:<South Park
